mapper.sql: t_user.id as userId, t_user.phone as userPhone, t_user.email as userEmail, t_user_detail.nickname as userDetailNickname, t_user_detail.headicon as userDetailHeadicon, t_goods_order.id as goodsOrderId, t_goods_order.order_no as goodsOrderOrderNo, t_goods_order.total_amount as goodsOrderTotalAmount, t_goods_order.pay_amount as goodsOrderPayAmount, t_goods_order.discount_amount as goodsOrderDiscountAmount, t_goods_order.integral_amount as goodsOrderIntegralAmount, t_goods_order.express_fee as goodsOrderExpressFee, t_goods_order.order_status as goodsOrderOrderStatus, t_goods_order.pay_time as goodsOrderPayTime, t_goods_order.pay_type as goodsOrderPayType, t_goods_order.transaction_no as goodsOrderTransactionNo, t_goods_order.pay_success as goodsOrderPaySuccess, t_goods_order.deliver_time as goodsOrderDeliverTime, t_goods_order.deal_time as goodsOrderDealTime, t_goods_order_logistics.real_name as goodsOrderLogisticsRealName, t_goods_order_logistics.phone as goodsOrderLogisticsPhone, t_goods_order_logistics.province as goodsOrderLogisticsProvince, t_goods_order_logistics.city as goodsOrderLogisticsCity, t_goods_order_logistics.district as goodsOrderLogisticsDistrict, t_goods_order_logistics.address as goodsOrderLogisticsAddress, t_goods_order_logistics.is_deliver as goodsOrderLogisticsIsDeliver, t_goods_order_logistics.logistics_company as goodsOrderLogisticsLogisticsCompany, t_goods_order_logistics.logistics_code as goodsOrderLogisticsLogisticsCode, t_goods_order_logistics.logistics_no as goodsOrderLogisticsLogisticsNo, t_goods_order_logistics.version as goodsOrderLogisticsVersion, t_goods_order_logistics.create_time as goodsOrderLogisticsCreateTime, t_goods_order_logistics.update_time as goodsOrderLogisticsUpdateTime
mapper.select:
select
from t_user, t_user_detail, t_goods_order, t_goods_order_logistics where t_user.id = #{id} and t_user.id = t_user_detail.id and t_goods_order.user_id = t_user.id and t_goods_order.id = t_goods_order_logistics.id

select
from t_user, t_user_detail, t_goods_order, t_goods_order_logistics where t_user.id = t_user_detail.id and t_goods_order.user_id = t_user.id and t_goods_order.id = t_goods_order_logistics.id order by t_user.update_time desc, t_user.create_time desc

select
from t_user, t_user_detail, t_goods_order, t_goods_order_logistics
order by
${query.sortColumn} ${query.sortOrder}
t_user.update_time desc, t_user.create_time desc
select count(*) from t_user, t_user_detail, t_goods_order, t_goods_order_logistics
